content: learn to crochet this beautiful christmas stocking with this crochet pattern a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ a free copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog https //richtexturescrochet com this pdf includes the charts to complete both designs skill level intermediate gauge 17 sts x 20 row of single_crochet = 4 inches finished size 7 5 x 20 inches laid flat yarn heartland® by lion brand® 100% acrylic 5 oz 142 g approx 251 yds 230 m worsted/medium weight 4 colour a redwood or joshua tree and colour b grand canyon - 1 ball of each colour hook size j/8 6 0 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle stitch marker christmas bauble with 10 inch circumference or some fibrefill
